group_1.textLeft: Mmmm...! Delicious!

group_1.textRight: H-how is it...?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, if I had to use an analogy...
Just plain delicious!

group_1.textRight: That's not an analogy!
But, what you're aiming for is...
"Now THIS is Kamihama! This taiyaki will@make me remember the fun I had today"...
I guess it's not good enough?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it might be a bit lacking in impact...

group_1.textRight: Not that I'm one to speak, but...
You can't just focus on the impact, right...?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, I know, but since we came all the way to@Kamihama...
It's gotta be a Kamihama thing...@Hmm, what should we doooo...

group_1.textRight: The store we're at right now is the most@famous one around here, though...

group_1.textLeft: Mmmm...

group_1.narration: "Excuse meee... Could I have a teensy, tiny@moment of your time?"

group_1.textLeft: O-okay?@[chara:403201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:403201:motion_400][chara:403201:lipSynch_1]...Ahhh?!
It's a maaaaaid!!!

group_1.textRight: Kyaaa! That's a great reaction, I'm super duper@thankful!

group_1.textLeft: Um... So, what can we do for you?

group_1.textRight: Whoopsie! Um, what I was saying was...!@[chara:305302:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305302:motion_1][chara:305302:cheek_1][chara:305302:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:305302:lipSynch_1]I actually have a teeny little favor to ask you.
I work as a super adorable maid at that cafe,@aaaand...
Lend me those fish earrings, pretty pleeeease!

group_1.textLeft: Everyone... Thank youuuu!

group_1.textCenter: Uh... Umm, from now on...@Please take care of me... Meow!

group_1.narration: "Ooooooh!!"@"It's so cute and lovable how inexperienced she is!"@"So young!"@"She's a kitty!"@"If that girl is a cat, then I wanna be a fish."

group_1.textRight: That was fun!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... This place is amazing!@Kamihama's a really wide place, huh?

group_1.textCenter: Both of you! Thanks for your support!@It was a hit!

group_1.textRight: Ikumin! Your performance was great!

group_1.textLeft: Umm...really...if it weren't for the two of you...@I wouldn't have made it...meow.

group_1.textRight: The cat maid who loves fish!
Good job! Congratulations on your first@performance!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... There was a mistake in ordering this@girl's headband.
I thought we were done for when we received@dog designs, but...
Thanks to the wonderful earrings, I didn't have to@break character.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad I could help!

group_1.textLeft: However, I have another small favor to ask...

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: I was listening to the customers...
The fish earrings were very well received.
It's become something of her trademark.
So...if I may be so bold...these earrings...

group_1.textRight: You can have them!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305302:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]R-really?!

group_1.textRight: A-are you sure...? I thought those were like a@good luck charm...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
I'm glad they like the earrings I made!
And besides, this might turn it into taiyaki!

group_1.textRight: I see... You're right!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!
Th...thank you very much!@Here, this is for you...meow.

group_1.textRight: A present! I wonder what it is!@Thank you!

group_1.textLeft: I'd like to thank you, too...

group_1.textRight: Miss Maid!
Do you know where I can find a good taiyaki@place in Kamihama?

group_1.textLeft: Taiyaki?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, there's a reason why I need to@find one...
I've already looked at all the stores@around here.

group_1.textLeft: Taiyaki, taiyaki...
Ah! Speaking of taiyakiâ€”
(...Wait, I can't tell a non-Magical Girl about her,@can I?)
(She must have checked all the stores in Kosho...@What's left is...)
You can find a good restaurant in Sankyo!

group_1.textRight: Really?! Tell me more!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, I'll get you a map right now!

group_1.textRight: .........[wait:0.8][chara:403201:lipSynch_1]By the way, Ikumin, for a while now...
You reverted back to your "Ikumi" form.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305302:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah!
Tee hee! That's not truuue...@[chara:305302:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305302:motion_400][chara:305302:cheek_1][chara:305302:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:305302:lipSynch_1]You silly goose!

group_1.textRight: What a pro!
